files.patch:
@@ -54,0 +54,1 @@
+
@@ -127,2 +128,1 @@
-      new (stalled_message) Message(output, decorations, msg, msg_len);
-      _stalled_message = (Message*)stalled_message;
+      _stalled_message = new (stalled_message) Message(output, decorations, msg, msg_len);
@@ -131,0 +131,1 @@
+      // Note: we still hold the producer lock so cannot race against other threads trying to log a message
@@ -213,7 +214,7 @@
-  : _flush_sem(0),
-    _producer_lock(),
-    _consumer_lock(),
-    _data_available(false),
-    _initialized(false),
-    _stats(),
-    _stalled_message(nullptr) {
+: _flush_sem(0),
+  _producer_lock(),
+  _consumer_lock(),
+  _data_available(false),
+  _initialized(false),
+  _stats(),
+  _stalled_message(nullptr) {
